content:
Dear Colleagues,

Welcome to the Weather, Climate & Emergency Preparedness (WCEP) Scholarly Community!

We are pleased to share with you direct access to the WCEP Scholarly Community (via MS Teams: Click Here) where you will be able to interact with over 100 UAlbany faculty, researchers, and staff in real-time.

The WCEP Scholarly Community will provide information on upcoming events, funding opportunity announcements, news and success stories of colleagues, a student jobs board, along with other valuable resources and tools to enhance collaborative research and extramural funding pursuits. So if you:

Want to stay up-to-date on what’s happening with the Weather, Climate, and Emergency Preparedness enterprise? Turn on channel notifications!
  • Have a funding opportunity to share or are looking for a research collaborator? Post it in the "Funding Opportunity Channel”
Are Looking for a talented student to help on your project? Post it in the "Student Job Board Channel"
Know of an event that might be of interest to the Community? Post it in the "Events Channel”
Have a resource, or article, a new tool/app, to share? Post it in the "Resources Channel”
Or just know of someone who might be interested in being a new member of the Community? “Ask Them to Join” by Sending This Link!

It is our hope that the WCEP Scholarly Community will enable research collaboration and knowledge exchange, foster joint scholarship and publication, grow extramural funding, support the future research forums and conferences, and eventually build out an overall sustainable and thriving community of interdisciplinary researchers to address the most significant threat facing society today.

We plan to demo the WCEP Scholarly Community at our next scheduled meeting on Friday, April 15, 2022. Please save the date and we will share with you more details via the “Events Channel”. In the meantime, feel free to click here to start your involvement in the Community and get connected today.
